title: I still cant figure what riot was thinking with bard
body:
Making a support that forces the adc to 1v2 a lane is pretty r%%%%%ed.

I actually dont think hes bad and his weak early is a tradeoff for his massive utility, which is fine but i still dont know why the whole roaming gimmick, one of the support main roles is to protect/get the adc through the laning phase, not to just ditch them and run around the map to collect shit.
